應.definition: to answer; to respond; to comply with; to deal or cope with

應仁之亂.definition: Ōnin war 1467-1477 between factions of Ashikaga shogunate

應付自如.definition: to handle matters with ease (idiom); to hold one's own

應付裕如.definition: handling any occasion smoothly (idiom); equal to any situation

應允.definition: to give one's assent; to consent; Taiwan pr. [ying4 yun3]

應分.definition: (of a course of action) within one's area of responsibility; expected of one; obligatory (for a person in that role)

應制.definition: to write a poem on the order of the Emperor

應卯.definition: to answer the roll call at 卯時|卯时[mao3 shi2], i.e. between 5 and 7 am; fig. to put in a conventional appearance

應名兒.definition: erhua variant of 應名|应名[ying1 ming2]

應和.definition: to echo one another; to respond (in agreement)

應城.definition: Yingcheng, county-level city in Xiaogan 孝感市[Xiao4 gan3 shi4], Hubei

應城市.definition: Yingcheng, county-level city in Xiaogan 孝感[Xiao4 gan3], Hubei

應天承運.definition: lit. to respond to heaven and suit the times (idiom); to rule according to the will of heaven; the Divine Right of kings

應天順時.definition: lit. to respond to heaven and suit the times (idiom); to rule according to the will of heaven; the Divine Right of kings

應對.definition: to answer; to reply; to handle; to deal with; response

應對如流.definition: to respond fluently; to answer smartly

應屆畢業生.definition: student graduating in the current year; recent graduate

應市.definition: to respond to the market; to buy or sell according to market conditions

應徵.definition: to apply (for a job); to reply to a job advertisement

應急.definition: to respond to an emergency; to meet a contingency; (attributive) emergency

應急待命.definition: emergency standby; to be on standby

應戰.definition: to take up a challenge; to face an attack and meet it

應承.definition: to agree (to do sth); to promise

應接.definition: to attend to; to deal with

應接不暇.definition: more than one can attend to (idiom); deluged (with inquiries etc); overwhelmed (by the beauty of the scenery)

應援.definition: (originally) to provide assistance; (more recently) to show one's support (for a singing idol etc)

應收.definition: (of a sum of money etc) receivable

應敵.definition: to face the enemy; to meet an attack

應有.definition: to deserve (attention, respect etc); should have (freedoms, rights etc)

應有盡有.definition: everything that should be here is here (idiom); all one can think of is on hand; to have all one needs

應機立斷.definition: to act on an opportunity (idiom); to take prompt advantage of a situation

應激.definition: stress (abbr. for 應激反應|应激反应[ying4ji1 fan3ying4])

應用.definition: to put to use; to apply; practical; applied (science, linguistics etc); application; practical use; (computing) app

應用文.definition: applied writing; writing for practical purposes (business letters, advertising etc)

應用程序接口.pinyin: ying4 yong4 cheng2 xu4 jie1 kou3

應用程序編程接口.pinyin: ying4 yong4 cheng2 xu4 bian1 cheng2 jie1 kou3

應用程式介面.pinyin: ying4 yong4 cheng2 shi4 jie4 mian4

應縣.definition: Ying County in Shuozhou 朔州[Shuo4 zhou1], Shanxi

應縣木塔.definition: the timber pagoda of the Fogong Temple in Ying County, Shanxi, built in 1056 (Song dynasty)

應聘.definition: to accept a job offer; to apply for an advertised position

應聘者.definition: person taking a job; job applicant; CL:位[wei4]

應聲.definition: an answering voice; to answer a voice; to respond; to copy a voice; to parrot

應訴.definition: (of a defendant) to respond to a charge; to defend oneself

應診.definition: to see patients (of doctor); to hold a surgery

應詔.definition: to respond to an imperial decree

應試教育.definition: exam-oriented education; teaching to the test

應該的.definition: you're most welcome; sure thing!; I did what I was supposed to do

應諾.definition: to promise; to agree to do sth

應變.definition: to meet a contingency; to adapt oneself to changes

應運.definition: to conform with destiny; as the occasion demands

應運而生.definition: to emerge to meet a historic destiny (idiom); to arise at an opportune time; able to take advantage of an opportunity; to rise to the occasion

應選.definition: to run for election; to be selected; to be elected

應酬.definition: to engage in social activities; to socialize; dinner party; banquet; social engagement

應驗.definition: to come true; to come about as predicted; to be fulfilled
